abstract: The aircraft manufacturer presented the Japanese government with its plan to prevent recurrences of the battery problems that have grounded its Dreamliners.
snippet: The aircraft manufacturer presented the Japanese government with its plan to prevent recurrences of the battery problems that have grounded its Dreamliners.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — Boeing on Thursday presented the Japanese government with its plan to address battery problems on its new 787 Dreamliner, stressing that added protections against possible battery fires and overheating are more than enough to allow its planes back in the air.

headline.main: Boeing Offers Plan for 787s To Japanese
headline.print_headline: Boeing Offers Plan for 787s To Japanese
